safetyTips: We are following all the Government advises to make sure our restaurant is a Covid secure place.
name: EVEREST INN HYTHE
description: Everest Inn Hythe, Nepalese and Indian Restaurant, serving Hythe Area since 2004. We provide restaurant and takeaway service. We serve Hythe and surrounding areas. Open evening from 5 to 9 pm. Order via phone or online.
